name: WooCommerce sale product date info
author: Motpr355

sections.installation:
1/ Install the plugin in “Plugins” => “Add new”
2/ Activate the plugin in “Plugins” => “Installed plugins”
3/ Configure the plugin in “Plugins” => “Installed plugins” => “WooCommerce sale product date info” => “Settings”, or in “Products” => “Sale product date info”
4/ Save your configuration
sections.changelog:
1.0.9

  • Display product sale start date option
  • Translations update

1.0.7

  • Translations update

1.0.6

  • Redirect to plugin’s settings after installation

1.0.5

  • First release
sections.description:
Display a customizable sale date tag for WooCommerce products.

Description & features

Welcome to the “WooCommerce sale product date info” by Motpr355 plugin.

This plugin is fully free ; no hidden features, no premium features, no ads, no account creation… Just a free plugin made with love by Motpr355.

This plugin allow you to display a customizable sale date tag for WooCommerce products.

You can customize your tag in the plugin settings.
List of customizable options:
– Activate or deactivate functionnality
– Choose tag background color with a color picker
– Choose tag color with a color picker
– Choose font weight between normal and bold
– Choose text transform. Examples: “On sale until 2018-10-01”, “ON SALE UNTIL 2018-10-01″… Date format is the one defined in WordPress Settings > General.
– Choose if you want to display sale start date, end date, or both
– Preview the tag before save configuration

Plugin translations

This plugin is actually available in:
– English
– French

Informations

Motpr355 assumes absolutely no liability for damage or losses of any kind, whether for direct, indirect or consequential damage, arising from the use of this plugin.
